Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Authorizes the commission on ethics and lobbying in government to provide a training course concerning anti-sexual harassment training for lobbyists and requiring lobbyists to complete the course annually
Summary: Authorizes the commission on ethics and lobbying in government to provide a training course concerning anti-sexual harassment training for lobbyists; requires lobbyists to complete the course annually.
LawCode: Amd §1-d, rel §§1-u & 1-v to be §§1-v & 1-w, add §1-u, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to authorizing the commission on ethics and lobbying in government to provide a training course concerning anti-sexual harassment training for lobbyists and requiring lobbyists to complete the course annually
